exploreinvenstment.title: Zuari Rain Forest
exploreinvenstment.ProjectBy: Project By Zuari Infraworld India Ltd
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Zuari Rainforest is a hub of top-class amenities that let you live a relaxed and stress-free life in the amazing locales of Goa. The attractive facilities provided are a modern club house, lotus ponds, swimming pool with well-demarcated kids pool, outdoor barbeque area, kids play area, power back up, gym, jogging track, yoga centre, waiting lounge and wide lungs of open green spaces to breathe in fresh air.

Zuari Rainforest is a villa residential complex launched by Adventz Zuari InfraWorld India Ltd and stationed in Goa. Sprawling acros huge landscaped area, Zuari Rainforest South Goa, Sancoale, Goa, offers 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartments and 4 BHK villas spanning 600 sq. ft. 2800 sq. ft. It encloses a private forest area extended across 20 acres. The posh residential venture is comfortably located within the green and beautiful surroundings of Goa. The premium villas and residences swaddled in lush greeneries are a true manifestation of luxury, comfort with a touch of class. Each apartment and villas is replete with thoughtfully designed interiors and feature high-quality comforts and conveniences that let you live a luxurious lifestyle.

Zuari Rainforest Stationed at Sancoale, South Goa, the magnificent project is designed and developed to be the countrys high-end lifestyle and leisure destination overlooking Zuari River. It is mere 5 kms from Goa International Airport and 3 kms from BITS Pilani Goa. All the emergency and essential places like hospitals, schools, banks etc. are located in proximity to the Zuari Rainforest project. Sancoale is one of the most popular and best places to own a Property in Goa and is close to locations like Siridao, Dona Paula, Vasco Da Gama and Verna. Thus, the beautiful abodes at Zuari Rainforest are a fabulous idea of living and offer you an uncompromised lifestyle at a decent price tag.

exploreinvenstment.title: Zuari Garden City
exploreinvenstment.ProjectBy: Project By Zuari Infraworld India Ltd
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Zuari Garden City Apartment Zuari Garden City, the first ever integrated residential township in Mysore brings you garden homes set amidst exceptional lifestyle facilities at an affordable price. Zuari Garden City is a premium project that redefines luxury living in Mysore. Viable as a home or a weekend getaway, Zuari Garden City offers you uber-luxurious villas, town houses and apartments on 73 acres of land with the facilities and amenities, which have been thoughtfully put together to offer rejuvenating options of international standards as well as cultivating the culture of Mysore.

Zuari Garden City through its Residential luxury apartments in Mysuru aim to translate the vision of this beautiful city into your dream home. It is difficult to not be enamored by this sprawling 73 acres dream project that houses apartments amidst open spaces that offer a calming and rejuvenating experience.

 - The Apartments are designed by the famous Thomas Associates, one of the leading architects in Bangalore.
 - Enjoy the lush green landscape, walk under the trees and relax with various outdoor games and entertainment activities.

A future of serene, peaceful, pollution free living awaits you.

The Apartments at Zuari Garden City are a true blend of luxury and aesthetics.

- Apartments are spread across 3 Towers with different floors (G+10, G+12).
-  2,3 & 4 Bedroom apartment size ranges from 115.1 Sqm (1240 Sqft) to 216.9 Sqm (2335 Sqft)
- Rainwater Harvesting, Round the Clock Security, Clubhouse, Swimming Pool, Grocery Stores etc.

These apartments are well connected to hospitals, colleges, schools, malls and other wonderful attractions that this great city offers.

exploreinvenstment.title: City of Music Villas
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
City OF Music is Indias first music inspired weekend Home township, being developed over 22 acres of green expanse amidst beautiful Amba river and farms. The project is situated at Khopoli - Pali Road, which is emerging as the most sought after investment destination, just 2 hours drive from Mumbai. City Of Music is being designed to integrate luxury weekend homes and villas with world class amenities and recreation facilities. 

What differentiates City Of Music from other projects are the musical features of this exclusive township. The outdoor musical features include open air concert area, musical gardens, swimming pool with under water music, musical fountains, outdoor music zones, musical landscapes, invisible speakers and many more. The indoor musical features include recording studio with instrument zone, music library, wall of music, music themed restaurant, music academy, museum, spa , juke box, specially designed speakers installed in every home and many more. The music concerts and performances from renowned musicians will make this project a landmark in music and realty world. City of Music will truly enable its residents to discover life in music and music in life.
With its innovative concept and world class designs and amenities, City Of Music is poised to become the most sought after destination for everyone who loves music and seeks exotic surrounding. 

Project Specification:
Walls
Neru finished cement plaster

Floors
Wood laminate flooring in master bedroom
High quality 2X2 vitrified tiles in all other rooms
Anti-skid ceramic tile flooring in toilets

Doors
Main door laminate/veneer finished flus door with a teakwood frame & night latch
Bedrooms laminate/veneer finished flush door with a wooden frame
Toilet waterproof wood finis doors with a marble frame

Plumbing
Water storage tank for each building
Concealed plumbing with UPVC pipes
Hot & Cold water fixtures
Jaquar or equivalent fixtures for all bathrooms & toilets

Kitchens
Polished black granite platform with stainless steel sink
Glazed tiles on dado

Sanitation
Branded ceramic fixtures & wash basin
Glazed wall tiles up to 7 feet high on dado

Electrical
Video door phone & bell
Good quality concealed copper wiring
Branded ISI-mark switches & electrical fitting
Inverter backup

Windows
High-quality powder coated aluminum frame windows with marble window frame & clear float glass

Painting
Plastic emulsion paint

exploreinvenstment.title: Wollywood Villas
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Imagine a mesmerizing world that opens on a 70mm backdrop of sheer breathtaking locales. An enthralling experience awaits you with open arms. Inviting your wary senses to a silent promise of rejuvenation. Welcome to Wollywood, a unique second home project thats inspired from Bollywood to offer you the true grandeur of villa living amidst a fantasy world, Its a dream second home project that ensures you dont miss out on a world of non-stop action, bewitching romance and unparalleld drama!
Wollywood is a thoughtfully designed 22 acres of township, comprised of 2BHK Gold, 2BHK Platinum, 3BHK Platinum & 3BH Diamond Villas . You will spend hours at Wollywood riverside Cheeni Kum Caf, riverside sit out, gazebo with landscape garden & many more acitivities.
 
It draws on the water elements not only for aesthetics, but to align the township properly with vaastu to appeal to the spirituality of our residents. You will look forward to hours of peaceful wanderings inside the Wollywood township.

 You will spend hours in the Wollywood multimedia center, practice your dance numbers by the swimming pool and clubhouse, and smile as though youve never smiled before. Wollywood is located at Wada, Mumbais unexplored investment destination. At the nexus of the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor, the Mumbai-Ahmedabad Highway, and the Mumbai-Nashik Highway, Wada is poised for great things. 

SPECIFICATION:
INTERNAL
-WALLS
Neru-finished cement plaster
Glazed tiles up to 7 feet high on dado
-FLOORS
Anti-skid ceramic tile flooring in washrooms
-DOORS
Main door: Laminate-finished flush door with a wooden frame, a night latch, and peepholes
Bedrooms: Laminate-finished flush door with a wooden frame
Toilet: Waterproof PVC doors with a marble frame
-ELECTRICITY
Concealed ISI-marked electrical fittings
Living Room: One common TV, antenna, and telephone point, and one AC point
Bedroom: One common TV, antenna, and telephone point, and one AC point
Kitchen: One refrigerator point
Washroom: Light, geyser and plugin point in each wash room
-PLUMBING
Water storage tank for each building
Washroom: Concealed work with UPVC pipes, hot and cold water fixtures, Jaguar or equivalent fixtures, and a provision for a geyser
3 years leakage guarantee
-KITCHEN
One granite platform with stainless steel sink
One water purifier
-SANITATION
Washroom: Branded wash basin and sink
-WINDOWS
Powder-coated aluminum windows with marble window frame
-PAINTING
Tractor emulsion or equivalent

EXTERNAL
Roads made of tar using modern construction processes
Paver blocks on pathways
Bus shelter for local and school buses
Compound outer wall
Earthquake-resistant RCC-framed structure
Double-coat sand-faced cement plaster
Weather-proof paint
anemities: Page 3 Club House with Swimming Pool

exploreinvenstment.title: Lotus Villas
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Lotus Villas - Madurai is an exclusive affordable gated community residential project located at Pudhu Thamaraippatti in a scenic land scape over looking 'AANAI MALAI'. Blended with a contemporary look and spacious area, every villa is designed with perfection to offer a comfortable stay to residents. Every villa is designed with proper cross ventilation feature to keep the area refreshing and pleasant. Lotus Villas is blessed with the modern style of amenities and services that facilitate the residents to the maximum. 

VNCT Lotus Villas is the largest residential project with 207 independent villas ranging from 700 sqft of land area with a built of area of 450 sqft to 1800 sqft land area with a built up area of 1000 sq ft. The project comes with adequate amenities to lead a peaceful living with very low maintenance cost.

Project type: Affordable villas
Total land area: Over 10 Acres
Total No. of Villas: 207 Villas

Features:
- Own your individual,beautiful home at most affordable cost.
- Great investment
- Green park
- Fully developed gated villa community with fencing and security
- Great appreciation
- Pharmacy,ATM & super market
- Each villa with a car park
- Fully laid roads with paver block flat form for walking
- Bus stop outside
- Easy payment options
- Children's parks
- Most developing area

exploreinvenstment.title: The White Villas
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Our vision has always been to create value homes to our customers by providing luxury villas at the most affordable price. In keeping with this philosophy, it is with pride & privilege that we wish to announce the launch of our prestigious project 'The White Villas', an exclusive gated community at Jadcherla. It offers spacious and skillfully designed 3BHK villas at very affordable prices. The project is well equipped with all the amenities to facilitate the needs of the residents.

Hyderabad with its unique mixed cultural and historical tradition spanning 400 years is the capital city of Indias infant, newly constituted state Telangana. Hyderabad is the 5th most dynamic city in the world and is rated as the first Indian city with the best quality of living.

The White Villas at Jadcherla is just an hours drive from Hyderabad. Telangana being the new State and fast growing is encouraging investments in various sectors across the State. Jadcherla being a census town well connected to major destinations through national and state highways is an economically growing and a diverse region. Jadcherla has become the venue for Pharmaceutical industry of Special Economic Zone, Green Industrial Park, Educational institutions thereby, facilitating growing job markets and profitable real estate investments.

Branded Ceramic tiles for 2 above kitchen granite Platform.
Branded Ceramic tiles to a height of 7 in all toilets.

Main Door complete with frame, architrave and door panel

exploreinvenstment.title: The White Villas
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Located in Shahapur, Mumbai, The White Villas is a premium housing project launched by St Angelos VNCT Ventures. The project offers Villa in 3, 5 BHK configurations available from 1700 sqft to 3400 sqft. These units in Beyond Thane, are available at an attractive price. The White Villas has many amenities, such as Gated Community, Landscaped Gardens, Swimming Pool, Club House, Car Parking etc.

A mixture of botanical colour hues pristine whites. With a continuous frequency of nature light that creates harmony and serenity. Spacious, Airy planned layouts.

The white villas concept, stucco walls, herring bone doors, bougenville landscape, all have been born from Grecian architecture. Mediterean homes was just the right inspiration to make the earthy surroundings merge into the conceptual design of the entire project.

Perfect for the traveler, the tranquil hearted adventurer and the passionate home maker. The surroundings will surely make your days blissful, peaceful and refreshed.

exploreinvenstment.title: Umiya Sundance
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
The Umiya Sundance is spread across large area of well- maintained landscape that is designed with blossoming gardens, large number of trees, spacious walkways and emerald meadows. Constructed in the lap of nature, the Umiya Sundance in Vasco Da Gama, Goa is an ideal place to buy home if you admire nature or want to live a healthy and stress- free life with your family. These 2BHK and 3BHK flats that are available for sale in Umiya Sundance are spacious and well- ventilated. 

The lavish Umiya Sundance is one place where sea and sun meet and if you book a flat in Umiya Sundance, you wake up to beautiful and pleasing sea views with sun right above the waves. The project is constructed by the Umiya Builders and Developers that was established with aim to deliver retail, commercial and residential properties and expanded its footprints in Goa in 2007. The residential flats in Umiya Sundance feature RCC framed structure, internal and external walls of latrine stone/red bricks/CC blocks/fly ash blocks, stain proof vitrified tiles in bathroom, living room, dining room and kitchen, anti-skid ceramic tiles in bathroom, utility area and balconies, main door with teak wood frame shutters and brass fittings, bedroom marine flush door with hardwood frame and teak veneer on both sides, bathroom doors with FRP frame and flush shutters, powder coated/anodized windows with tinted glass, kitchen with granite platform and matte finish single bowl stainless steel sink with drain board, bathrooms with sanitary fittings, ceiling fans in dining room, living room and bedrooms, exhaust fan in kitchen and bathroom, 25 liter geyser in all bathrooms, AC points with ducting in all bedrooms etc.
The society is loaded with modern amenities like fully- equipped gym, squash court, table tennis, carom board, reader room with tea/coffee vending machine, swimming pool with a deck, kids play etc. The project is equipped with automated homes as you can control the appliances and lights in your home from your tablet or smartphone without getting up from your place.

exploreinvenstment.title: Umiya Serene
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Umiya Serene is strategically located in Nerul, Goa offering spacious 2 BHK apartments fully equipped amenities and various features. Umiya Builders and Developers have thoughtfully planned the infrastructure with a strong foundation and designer interiors. It is a RERA registered and ready to move the project. The project architect is Kabir Hira.

Nerul Bardez is a prime locality in North Goa spread along the vast coastal area spanning the Mandovi river on one side with bottle green hillocks on the other. It is best known for its coconuts and wide variety of seafood. Specially, the mussels from this locale are the most enjoyed by the people all over North Goa. Nerul Bardez which was earlier known as Nellur shares its boundaries with the historic village of Verem-Reis Magos in the East and separated from Candolim by the Sinqueim river adding a riverine charm halting in the inland of the Verem Dyke. Nerul Bardez has its own parish in the form of the church dedicated to Our Lady of Remedies constructed in 1569, by the Franciscan orders and is truly a marvelous architectural wonder. A temple dedicated to Goddess Shanta Durga also exist here. The feast of the patroness, Our Lady of Remedies is held every year in November amidst great pomp and splendour with the food festivals held here. There is lots of roadways and expressway to connect the Nerul Bardez. There is Verem-Nerul Road, Nerul-Reis Margos Road and Nerul-Pilerne Road serves an important connectivity to other places of the city. Goa International Airport is at brief driving distance from this locale whereas Vasco Railway Station is the closest one. Supreme Industries is near to area, which also attracts working professionals to settle here. Of course, all the beaches of North Goa are very easily accessible from Nerul Bardez. With the presence of basic establishments, Nerul Bardez has attracted many property investors.

SPECIFICATIONS:
Exterior & Interior Structure

Structure
-RCC framed structure
-Internal and external walls of laterite stone / red bricks / CC blocks / fly ash blocks
Flooring 
-Vitrified tiles with Nano technology (stain proof) in living, dining and bedroom & kitchen.
-ceramic non-skid tiles in bathroom, utility and balcony

-Ceramic 7ft height dado tiles in bathroom
-Ceramic 2ft height dado tiles in kitchen

-Main door: Teak wood frame with teak veneer door with fittings
-Bedrooms: Hard wood door frame with marine flush door with veneer with fittings
-Bathroom: FRP frame and door with fittings

Kitchen

-Single bowl with drain board stainless steel sink
Bathrooms

-Sanitary ware Jaquar or equivalent white sanitary ware
Painting

-Internal walls with first quality acrylic paint and ceilings with OBD paint
Power Supply 
-5KVA with 3 phase power supply with dedicated transformer to avoid fluctuations
-100 per cent power back up for common area, lift and pumps and club house
-Roma /equivalent modular switches
-Telephone & T.V. points in living room and bedrooms

exploreinvenstment.title: Rio De Goa
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Think Goa & youre transported to a land of eternal sunshine, surf and a never ending celebration called life. Spread across 4.82 acres of verdant landscape, Rio de Goa pays a tribute to all of this & also provides you a resort-like lifestyle with luxurious amenities, a lavish multi-level clubhouse and a central active green zone. Designed by an internationally acclaimed architectural firm HB Design, Rio de Goa is a Spanish themed gated community. The development consists of 14 towers of 8 floors each, an intimate high-rise architecture with distinctively conceptualized homes. Every aspect of Rio-De-Goa is designed & conceptualized for better living with no dearth of fun.

INTERNAL SPECIFICATIONS:
 -LIVING/DINING KITCHEN: Premium Vitrified Tiles
 -UTILITY AREA IN THE KITCHEN: Ceramic flooring tiles, MS railing
 -MASTER AND OTHER BEDROOMS: Premium Quality Vitrified tiles
 -SECURITY: Surveillance Cameras at the gate, 24-hour CCTV Monitoring in the guardroom, intercom facility from security gate to each apartment
 -TOILETS: Designer toilet, High-quality CP and Sanitaryware

exploreinvenstment.title: Dreamz Goa Shiroda
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Dreamz Goa- A project meticulously designed by Level Up Constructions, is a reflection of what your Goan dreams are made of indeed! Nestled in verdant glories just 4 kilometres away from the Northern Goa District, Dreamz Goa stands tall in a cozy town named Shiroda. We ensured picking a location for the project which perfectly blends the urban style of living with deep interests of every nature enthusiast. Flanked by the Shiroda Paradise beach on one side and the divine arena of the Kamakshi temple on the other, Dreamz Goa is a project made with great love. Paying attention to every miniscule detail, this project is designed using the highest level of expertise, technology and construction material. The flat comes furnished with 1 ton ACs (Daikon), branded Refrigerator, LG Television and microwave with modular kitchen in the same price.

Our team has ensured presenting stunner apartments with not only a rock solid foundation but also with thoughtfully crafted amenities for a delightful experience. The only gated complex in Shiroda, Dreamz Goa is also the only seven storied building making it the tallest one so far. Centrally located and in the midst of exciting new upcoming developments w.r.t tourism, infrastructure and accessibility, DeamzGoa is a very good news for an inquisitive investor!
anemities: Fire Protection And Fire Safety Requirements

exploreinvenstment.title: Adora De Goa
exploreinvenstment.ProjectBy: Project By Provident - A Puravankara Company
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
The spectacular project is located on an idyllic waterfront overlooking the Zuari River, which will offer you and your family a lifestyle like no other.

Designed by internationally acclaimed architects, the premium apartments are drafted keeping all your needs and desires in mind. And heres the best part, this luxurious lifestyle will even fit your budget.

"The most reason to Invest in Goa Sometimes the best Investment is to invest in your own and your family's happiness. A Billion People know Goa means Happy.For more reason to invest in Adora De Goa."

Park Residences:

Inspired by the mid-rise red-brick buildings of Manhattan New York. Ideal for small families aspiring for opulence, as well as single individuals of a bustling city.

- Subscription plans for upkeeping by The Park
- Lifetime privileges The Park Hotels & Zone by The Park Hotels
- Privilege vouchers from The Park Hotels
- Customised designer interior solutions for homes

Park Residences Around the Blu is a premium development designed and located around
- The Blu @ Adora de Goa
- Club House @ The Blu
- Private Cabanas @ The Blu
- Decks around the Blu

exploreinvenstment.title: Kenisha Holiday Homes
exploreinvenstment.ProjectBy: Project By KPIN Real Estate Ventures
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Set in the backdrop of Dukes Nose and the valley, KENISHA is a beautiful voyage to be experienced, explored, and expressed by inspired minds.

It came into being with a single purpose: to let you slow down, unwind and to connect you with yourself.

An exclusive environ of nature, spread over thirty acres of land*, is designed and crafted to serve experience of traditional things in a contemporary manner. Sloping terrains, dense canopy of forest, and water bodies add their colours to its natural beauty. Here at KENISHA each home is planned with a spirit of its own.

Kenisha Holiday Homes is currently offering a unique habitat of 50+ Lifestyle Villas and cottages which blend into the natural splendor and contours of the mountain range and lush surrounding landscape.

Kenisha Holiday Homes, a pride of an owner!!!

To ensure this, we have meticulously planned every part of the project using a hybrid master plan encompassing the best features of Fan, Cluster and Grid patterns providing expansive terraces and slopping gardens. The primary objective is to make every part of the villa well connected to the walkways and roads, without losing privacy of every resident of KENISHA.

Each villa comes with a vegetable garden and an orchard space. The pleasure of plucking mangoes and vegetables is priceless!

The architecture is TRADCON, a blend of traditional and contemporary designs. The finesse and the specifications give a different meaning to your lifestyle and provide illustrious signature residences.

The approach is to offer all the elements for you to connect with yourself. Here you can relax over a wellness treatment, unwind yourself in a swimming pool, take a walk around the water body, enjoy reading in the library, simply relax in the gazebos & feel the nature, go for a hike or an adventure trail in the forest or enjoy star gazing.
anemities: Lounge with Library and Food services
Well-equipped Gymnasium with Steam Club House with Wellness centre & SPA
Water bodies with landscape and sit outs
Tent to stay during construction period

exploreinvenstment.title: Pristine Bay
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Welcome to Pristine Bay a place worthy its name, as an unpolluted pristine abode with the sea and a natural lake as boundaries. A unique concept of bespoke villa designs, it promises an enhanced lifestyle free of all stress. Safe and secure as an integrated gated villa community, Pristine Bay is the ideal habitat for not just those who seek fun, leisure and tranquillity, but also as a capital investment for future appreciation

The whole concept of Pristine Bay has been conceived as a large customized villa project, with natural boundaries of the sea to one side and a natural lake on the other side. The total layout is planned as 4 zones with the premium zone, being right on the beach. All the four zones have different plot sizes where bespoke villas are constructed with a lot of open space surrounding them. This long term visionary aspect is a unique feature which allows the residents to expand their space for living as and when required. All the requirements of a modern gated community are amply provided, making Pristine Bay a resident resort with a lake & a private beach.

Why Pristine Bayn
- A first of its kind. DTCP approved bespoke lifestyle project
- A large integrated and complacency customized villa community centrally located between Chennai and Puducherry
- Its unique location of having boundaries of the sea to one side and a natural lake filled with migratory birds so the other side
- Total outlay divided into 4 zones offering numerous customizable options
- All villas are customer-specific and are handcrafted with options for future enhancement. The villas can be designed to suit a group of friends relatives as owners.
- All villa constructions are Vaastu compliant.
- Capital Value Appreciation is one of its kinds in the project investment is more on the land and lee on the constructed villa. Apart from this, the general upkeep of the project ensures a greater capital value appreciation with time.
- Pristine Bay is totally automated with the latest safety and security features for a safe and secure lining
- The property maintained free of cost for the first 3 years and then maintained for a period of 10 years at a nominal fee.
- Pristine Bay managed by professional Hospitality team offering revenue maximization on the property if desired by the owner.
- Pristine Bay also offers a 27x7 Facility Management Service team to cater to electrical, housekeeping, gardening and other needs.
- Pristine Day is not just a villa community, but a unique concept of a  residential resort with its own private beach
anemities: Beautifully crafted sculptures in the landscaped gardens

exploreinvenstment.title: Oasis Alibaug
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject: Oasis is designed in resort-style, with a swimming pool. A glorious deck highlights your apartment and heightens the sense of lightness. It delicately blends the indoors with outdoors. Your deck is your solitude and entertainment zone rolled into one. The environment throbs with resort holiday spirit, complementing the stylishly simple design of the exterior and the interiors. The 4 storeyed condominium complex blends a meditative Oriental style with a breezy, outdoorsy feel that is lends a distinctive charm and beauty to the property.

exploreinvenstment.title: The Icon
exploreinvenstment.location: 13/2, Thanisandra Main Road Adjacent to Manyata Tech Park, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560077
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
The ICON is a property on 19 acres with a combination of 3, 4 Bedrooms & Penthouses. It stands majestic with 2 basements ground plus 27 stories excellent and smooth connectivity to all parts of Bangalore. and entirely free from bustling sound and noise/dust pollution, completely peaceful calm and serene residential atmosphere.

We would like to take you through a few of the unique features and designs of The ICON:
- Its is located adjacent to Manyata Tech Park & next to Elements Mall, a Walkable distance from Metro.
- Its designed for an IGBC Green Gold certificate for an energy-efficient eco-friendly environment.
- Walkable distance to Mall /Multiplexes and proposed METRO station.
- 19 Acres with 85% open area with lush green lawns, flower beds, forest paths/bird nesting trees. Putting Green. Motion Sensor Lighting for staircases.
- Vehicle free movements at the surface (Ground level).
- Solar street lighting
- 15 guests rooms to take care of your guests.
- Efficiency of 75% and above in the carpet area ratios
- Elevators at 8 feet height
- Finished floor to roof height 10 feet
- Main door with 8 feet height
- Servant room with toilet provided in all apartments.

There are many more features on the list to go like, apartments are fitted with the water saver fittings, no-smoking zone, efficient STP, dedicated pet areas, Multi-Purpose Hall for meetings/ Yoga/ Aerobics, Convenience store, ATM, Pharmacy, Laundry, Callisthenics facility etc and most importantly the property has absolutely clear titles, requisite approvals and construction is in full swing as per scheduled time.

exploreinvenstment.title: Canterbury Hillview
exploreinvenstment.location: Near Nandhi Hills, Melekote Cross, Tubugere Hobli, Doddaballapura Taluk, Bangalore, Karnataka 561205
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Unveiling Leisure Home for Doctors, NRIs, Professionals, Families.  Come and relax to beat the stress with a resort-like experience in your own home! Spend time with your family by trekking to Nandi Hills during the weekend, Work from home at your own leisure, enjoy a sumptuous meal at our club-house restaurant and spend a relaxed evening at the clubhouse & swimming pool.

- Lifetime Club House membership  in Canterbury Castles
- Canterbury Hillview holiday homes going to be Managed by  reputed Holiday home Company,  Trip Villas
- Enjoy your stay at Canterbury  Hillview Holiday Home as much you want. While you dont stay,  your holiday home generates rental income.

HOLIDAY HOME OPTIONS
- Standard holiday home with assured rentals
- Plot with 1 BHK & 3 BHK home

Available options:
Plot with 1 BHK Home - 1200 Sqft plot & 650 Sqft home
Plot with 3 BHK Home - 1200 Sqft plot & 1200 Sqft home

TOP REASONS TO OWN A PLOT / LEISURE HOME IN CANTERBURY HILLVIEW

- Return on Investment: Plot price likely to increase from INR.1250/Sft to INR.1800 / Sft in about a years time; enjoy capital gains benefit too
- Passive Rental Income: Assured rent of INR. 23,333 / month for 3 years
- Location: Leisure home close to Nandi Hills. Lifetime Canterbury Castles Clubhouse membership for the family
- Leisure/Holiday Homes Management: Managed by TripVillas.

exploreinvenstment.title: Sparsh Resort and Chalets
exploreinvenstment.location: Expat Sparsh, Naldhe Village, 2km from Kashele Village, Karjat - 410201, District Raigarh
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Expat Sparsh, located in Karjat near Mumbai, is the perfect getaway to create memorable moments with your family offers you an opportunity to invest in fully furnished weekend homes that are carefully planned to let you and your enjoy your weekends in a resort atmosphere, at a home away from home amidst greenery, tranquility and various amenities.

PROJECT HIGHLIGHTS: 
- Expat Sparsh is located in Karjat 90 kms from Mumbai a famous holiday destination which is also a declared residential green zone
- Sparsh consists of 1 BHK, 2BHK Chalets, and Studio Apartments. 
- The chalets are constructed on plots of varying ranging from 1300 Sq. ft. to 4500 Sq. ft. 
- The built-up area of 1 BHK Chalets is measuring to 550 Sq. ft. and 2 BHK is 660 Sq.ft. 
- The size of each Studio apartment ranges from 320-360 sq ft. and it is a G+2 construction
- Amenities on offer include Games room, Amphitheatre, Restaurant Conference Hall/ Party Hall, Children's Play Area, Mint Cricket Pitch, Barbecue, Swimming pool, Badminton, Rock Climbing and Obstacle Course
- Tourist destinations like Lonavala, Matheran and Khandala are in close proximity
- It is well connected via road by the Bhimashankar highway, railway with Neral and Karjat stations, via Mumbai Airport and the proposed Navi Mumbai Airport. Panvel is just 54 kms away from Expat Sparsh
- Karjat, is in Raigad district overseeing great industrialization and infrastructure developments

exploreinvenstment.title: The Ampelon
exploreinvenstment.ProjectBy: Project By Tefilah's Infra Pvt Ltd
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
The Ampelon, a new development in Chikkaballur that promises the tranquillity you seek away from an environment that takes its toll on you and your family. It is a home away from home, that offers you the relaxed existence one desires. Connecting with nature, self and family are the prime offerings that are designed to relax, reconnect and rejuvenate. Nestled in 37 acres the project offers customers wooded cottages in beautifully landscaped 5000 square feet private gardens. 

The Ampelon is equipped with a well-managed clubhouse, gym, and amenities that cater to all your basic needs. Besides we offer adventure activities such as Horse riding, Cycling, Trekking, and fishing. In our special activities portfolio, you could explore House Wine Making, Cheese Making or Honey Farming.

exploreinvenstment.title: The White Villas, Kasara
exploreinvenstment.ProjectBy: Project By St. Angelo's VNCT Ventures
exploreinvenstment.location: The White Villas Kasara S.N 2/1A, S.N. 3/2, Kasara Bk,Tal. Shahapur Dist.The, Thane, Maharashtra 421
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject:
Close to Mumbai, The White Villas Kasara, a project by Wealth Zone and SAVV, makes living in a spacious bungalow not just imaginable but possible. Flooded with natural light, the G + 1 R.C.C. villas with 20 feet high living rooms, spacious bedrooms with balconies attached to the master bedrooms, embody royalty. The individual terraces spare enough space for you to spend cozy fun moments with your family.

Every close to the project is the beautiful Ashoka waterfalls  a place for you to relax and unwind. A number of hospitals, schools, colleges, ATMs, supermarkets, resorts, fast food joints, restaurants, banks, hotels, petrol pumps, malls, temples, and gyms are also located within a close vicinity of the project. We chose this site particularly to get you the best ecosystem along with the necessary utilities to make your villa a home.
anemities: A balcony and an individual villa terrace

exploreinvenstment.location: Mangalyam Meadows Chanvai Rabda Road, Chanvai Village, Nr. AXN Resort, via Atul, Valsad - 396020
exploreinvenstment.AboutProject: Villas are crafted carefully keeping mind a lifestyle everyone craves for, a perfect balance of peace and modernity. A Clubhouse that is designed for your entire family, Theatre, Gymnasium, Discotheque, Library, Spa, Restaurant, Swimming Pool and a lot more. Take a jog on tree-lined roads, or simply team up with your friends and play at the multi-purpose sports court, you have many options to have a joyful healthy life.
